sentences.en: "Thank you very much." — "Don't mention it."
sentences.cn: “非常感谢！”——“别客气。”

sentences.en: (= it is important enough to mention ) that they only studied a very small number of cases.
sentences.cn: 必须说明的是他们仅研究了几个个案。

sentences.en: As I mentioned earlier , there have been a lot of changes recently.
sentences.cn: 正如我刚才所说的，最近变化很大。

sentences.en: At the com-munity centre, mention of funds produces pained looks.
sentences.cn: 在社区中心一提到资金问题，大家就会愁眉不展。

sentences.en: His immediate superior has singled him out for a special mention.
sentences.cn: 他的顶头上司特别提到了他。

sentences.en: His immediate superior, General Geichenko, had singled him out for special mention.
sentences.cn: 他的直接上级盖琴科将军特别提到了他。

sentences.en: I believe he was concerned in all those matters you mention.
sentences.cn: 我认为你提到的那些事都与他有关。

sentences.en: I felt as though I should mention it as an option.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我好像应该把它作为一种选择提出来。

sentences.en: I was going to mention it, but it slipped my mind.
sentences.cn: 我刚想提这件事，却又忘了。

sentences.en: I'd just like to mention that, personally, I don't think it's wise.
sentences.cn: 我只是想说，就我个人而言，我认为这并不明智。

sentences.en: I'm amazed you find the time, not to mention the energy, to do any work at all.
sentences.cn: 别说有那精力，就是你有时间做点事也够让我吃惊了。

sentences.en: It was both deliberate and malicious, not to mention clever.
sentences.cn: 这件事是处心积虑、早有预谋的，更不用说其手段的高明。

sentences.en: It was thoughtless of her to mention it.
sentences.cn: 她提起这事有些欠考虑。

sentences.en: It’s worth mentioning(= it is important enough to mention ) that they only studied a very small number of cases.
sentences.cn: 必须说明的是他们仅研究了几个个案。

sentences.en: Mention sex therapy and most people will titter in embarrassment.
sentences.cn: 提及性治疗，大多数人会尴尬地偷笑。

sentences.en: She dissolved into tears at the mention of Munya's name.
sentences.cn: 一提到芒雅的名字她就禁不住哭了起来。

sentences.en: She mentioned in passing (= mentioned in a quick unimportant way ) that you had just been to Rome.
sentences.cn: 她只是随口提了一下你刚刚去过罗马。

sentences.en: Some of the problems were mentioned in his report.
sentences.cn: 其中的一些问题在他的报告里提到了。

sentences.en: The colonies received only a passing mention.
sentences.cn: 那些殖民地只是顺带提了一下。

sentences.en: The mere mention of food had triggered off hunger pangs.
sentences.cn: 单单提到食物就引起了阵阵饥饿感。

sentences.en: The mere mention of John had touched a very raw nerve indeed.
sentences.cn: 提到约翰就真的让人心痛。

sentences.en: They all get a mention (= they are all mentioned ) in the book.
sentences.cn: 他们在书中全都被提到了。

sentences.en: Was my name mentioned at all?
sentences.cn: 我的名字被提到过吗？

phrases.tran_cn: n. 优秀奖；鼓励奖；荣誉奖
除 了…外（还)，更不必说
特别提名奖；（贷款等级）应加注意级

trans.tran_en: when someone mentions something or someone in a conversation, piece of writing etc
to talk or write about something or someone, usually quickly and without saying very much or giving details
